about_the_game:
Step into the cosmic canvas of Moons That Belong, where every decision paints your path to galactic supremacy. Immerse yourself in a universe where strategic depth meets artistic brilliance. Each node, each pathway, is a stroke of genius, offering you a harmonious blend of challenge and beauty. The game’s distinct icons and animations are not just markers of your progress; they are brushstrokes in the grand masterpiece of your conquest. Feel the pulse of the cosmos as you direct your fleets, each movement a symphony of strategy and elegance.

In Moons That Belong, your journey is more than just a game; it's an odyssey of the mind and soul. The serene yet vibrant backdrop of the galaxy is a stage set for your epic tale of conquest and exploration. The subtle animations, the consistent color schemes, and the intricate details invite you to lose yourself in a world where every moment is a chance to create, to strategize, and to triumph. Let the stars be your guide as you weave your legend across the infinite tapestry of space. Embrace the challenge, relish the beauty, and claim the moons that rightfully belong to you.

Key Features:

  • Campaign Mode: Get immersed by space intrigues and mystery in a hand-crafted set of missions about an empire that is yet to achieve greatness in a vast galaxy full of surprises.

  • Skirmish Battles: Play against AI or human opponents with the ability to tweak the game to better suit your playstyle. Do you prefer fast-paced rapid assault against your opponents or do you like to plan your moves out and get ready for the ultimate space showdown?

  • Scenario Editor: Design your own galaxy and put players to peculiar situations in your own handmade story!

  • Strategic Node Control: Take command of various planets, each with unique roles such as fortresses, production hubs, and neutral nodes. Cleverly distribute population across the galaxy to strengthen your presence at rivals' borders.

  • Fleet Management: Control the routes of your fleets with precision. Direct your fleets along pathways to sabotage the enemy from within their realm. Build an overwhelming force to defend your line from aggressive invaders.

  • Logistics and Planning: Balance your resources to build and upgrade your fleet, keep your planets safe from rivals, and expand your influence across the galaxy. Efficient resource allocation is key to your strategic success.

  • Combat and Defense: Engage in tactical battles to defend your territories or conquer new ones. Utilize different strategies and unit types to outmaneuver and overpower your enemies. Remember: An enemy without supply lines is no match to you at all!

Moons That Belong combines strategic depth with a visually appealing interface, making it an ideal game for both casual players and hardcore strategy enthusiasts. Prepare to conquer the galaxy, one moon at a time!

And the last thing, remember. All the moons belong to us!

(p.s. we may or may not have forgotten to add moons, maybe it's deliberate decision or an oversight, they still belong to us, however.)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 / Windows 8.1 / Windows 10 / Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 or equivalent
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Embark on a journey of strategy and domination in Moons That Belong, a 2D space strategy game that challenges your tactical prowess. Command your fleet, conquer planets, and outsmart your opponents in this visually captivating and intellectually engaging adventure.
